## Loading R packages

In the code chunk below, [p_load()](https://www.rdocumentation.org/packages/pacman/versions/0.5.1/topics/p_load) of [pacman](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/pacman/pacman.pdf) package is used to load tidyverse family of package.

```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, ggplot2)
```

```{r}
realis <- read_csv("data/realis2019.csv")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data=realis, aes(x = `Unit Price ($ psm)`)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 300)
```
